guide.title: Gentoo/AMD64 Test Requests
guide.abstract: This document lists special test cases which cannot be fulfilled by the members of this project, e.g. testing hardware drivers.

body.p: When testing hardware and/or software listed on this page, you may discover bugs that could break your system. Please perform these tests only if you're absolutely sure what you do!

Please keep in mind: When you fulfill any of the following test-requests, please be as detailed as possible when you report either success of failure of your testing efforts. The developer that requested the test completely relies on your judgement.
